description:
Yihdra is the brilliant child of a disgraced court mage, who seeks to redeem her family`s reputation and use sorcery for good. But when she meets an adventurer who transforms into an all-red suit wielding otherworldly weapons, it could be the first step in achieving her dream... or it could drive her crazy!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: The Red Ranger and the Mage
戦隊レッドと魔法使い
